str2: A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
To do not know, be ignorant of, sometimes with the idea of willful ignorance.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: From keimai; to put to sleep, i.e. to slumber; figuratively, to decease.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To pain, grieve, vex. From lupe; to distress; reflexively or passively, to be sad.
According to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as. From kata and hos; just as, that.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Left, left behind, the remainder, the rest, the others. Masculine plural of a derivative of leipo; remaining ones.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.
Hope, expectation, trust, confidence. From a primary elpo; expectation or confidence.
